title: TFR Ep. 574: Venom: Let There Be Carnage, Titane, Tokyo Gore Police, TFR Libs
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt check back in with their old buddy Eddie Brock and his symbiotic pal, Venom in ‘Venom: Let There Be Carnage’! With the original being as flawed as it was, does director Andy Serkis right the ship and deliver a superior sequel?  Or should we just head to the closest bell tower and be done with it?  Chris shares his thoughts on that French horror film where the woman gets impregnated by a car.  Is ‘Titane’ one of the best films of the year?!?  Then our Body Horror Marathon continues with ‘Tokyo Gore Police’.  One of the more gore-soaked films Matt and Chris have seen, that may be as disastrous as it is fun.  There’s the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week.  Then they guys close out the show with another round of everyone’s fill-in-the-blank game, TFR Libs, featuring some James Bond casting calls, 80’s movies sequels, and more!

 00:00-16:24: Intro/Venom: Let There Be Carnage

16:25-20:31: Titane

20:32-29:04: Physical Media Picks

29:05-35:23: Tokyo Gore Police

35:24-51:05: TFR Libs

51:06-52:36: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt check back in with their old buddy Eddie Brock and his symbiotic pal, Venom in ‘Venom: Let There Be Carnage’! With the original being as flawed as it was, does director Andy Serkis right the ship and deliver a superior sequel?  Or should we just head to the closest bell tower and be done with it?
